Welcome to GitiumFS’s documentation!¶

Contents:

class gitiumFS.utils.repository.Repository(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶
classmethod clone(remote_url, path)[source]¶

Clone a repo in a give path and update the working directory with a checkout to head (GIT_CHECKOUT_SAFE_CREATE)

commit(message, author, author_email, ref='HEAD')[source]¶

Wrapper for create_commit. It creates a commit from a given ref (default is HEAD)

get_remote(name)[source]¶

Retrieve a remote by name. Raise a ValueError if the remote was not added to repo

Examples:

repo.get_remote("fork")
pull(upstream, branch_name)[source]¶

Fetch from a remote and merge the result in local HEAD.

Examples:

repo.pull("origin", "master")
push(upstream, branch)[source]¶

Push changes from a branch to a remote

Examples:

repo.push("origin", "master")
